title: Executive Order 7264-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5807, of February 25, 1932, Withdrawing Public Lands, Colorado
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497, Executive Order No. 5807, of February 25, 1932, withdrawing public lands in T. 11 S., R. 96 W. of the sixth principal meridian, Colorado, pending a resurvey, is hereby revoked.
This order shall become effective upon the date of the official filing of the plat of resurvey of the said township.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7264-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5807, of February 25, 1932, Withdrawing Public Lands, Colorado Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362760
